thread.title: Hungry? These are the best restaurants in America this year
thread.title_full: Hungry? These are the best restaurants in America this year

title: Hungry? These are the best restaurants in America this year
text:
Hungry? These are the best restaurants in America this year 12:47 a.m. Friday, Oct. 16, 2015 | Filed in: Things to Do Things to Do DYLAN WILSON Mashama Baileyâ€™s take on Country Captain, served atop a slab of sourdough bread soaked in pan juices from the roast chicken, at the Grey in Savannah, Ga., July 7, 2015. In a building that once held a segregated bus station, chef Mashama Bailey is redefining African-American cooking in the South. (Dylan Wilson/The New York Times) 

Some say good food is essential to a happy life. AJC His Ecco restaurant was named a "Best New Restaurant" in 2006 by Esquire magazine, and chef Micah Willix (here with his chicken thighs with snap peas and agliata) gets the props for it. For those seeking an extra succulent meal, Food & Wine Magazine has released their Restaurants of the Year list, and Esquire Magazine released their Best New Restaurants list. Here are the eateries that made the cut: Esquire's Best New Restaurants
